header.description: +4 years of experience. Systems Engineer and Web Developer from Cartagena, Colombia. Specialized in user experience..

description.1: Developed microservices in Java using Spring Boot, applying hexagonal architecture and maintaining test coverage above 80% with JUnit and Mockito.
description.2: Optimized web interfaces using frameworks like Angular and Vue.js, focusing on enhancing user experience and implementing microservice consumption through dependency injection as a design pattern.
description.3: Collaborated in agile teams following the SCRUM methodology, actively participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and sprint reviews.
description.4: Trained and onboarded new developers, facilitating their technical integration and adaptation to the work environment and project technologies.

personal.title: Who am I?
personal.description:
I am Luis Alberto Gómez Arteaga, a Systems Engineer graduated from Fundación Universitaria Tecnológico Comfenalco in Cartagena, Colombia.

I am passionate about developing efficient technological solutions, applying best programming practices, and always maintaining a user-centered approach.

My objective is to continue expanding my knowledge of new technologies, strengthen the skills I have already acquired, and keep gaining experience as a developer in both backend and frontend.

perfil.title: My Profile
perfil.description:
Full-Stack Developer with +4 years of experience building web applications.

Skilled in frontend development using JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular, with basic knowledge of Vue.js. I design responsive, accessible interfaces.

Experienced in backend development with Java and Spring Boot, focusing on RESTful APIs and microservices. I apply SOLID principles and work with layered and hexagonal architectures. Proficient in relational databases like MySQL.

items.name: Aldea - Zabud
items.description: Business strategic planning software designed to centralize the definition, tracking, and analysis of organizational goals. Responsible for frontend development using Angular, focusing on microservices integration, modular component-based architecture, and user experience-centered interface design.

items.name: SB Microservice
items.description: Product and invoicing management API developed with Java and Spring Boot, following hexagonal architecture principles. Provides full CRUD operations for products and invoices in a modular, decoupled, and scalable structure.

items.name: People Agenda
items.description: Full Stack application developed during my initial training. Implements CRUD operations on a list of people, with a Spring Boot backend and an Angular frontend, using Bootstrap for responsive design.

contact.title: Contact
contact.info: If you’re interested in my profile, you can contact me through the following links or send me an email using the form below.
